Toggle Menu

Brenda Campbell
===============

![](https://www.cityofhutchinstx.gov/sites/g/files/vyhlif14911/files/styles/directory_listings_body_with_photo/public/media/city-council/image/846/1_brenda_campbell_0111.jpg.webp?itok=DAibi03d)

Position

Council Member

Email

[Email](https://www.cityofhutchinstx.gov/email-contact/node/1161/field_email "Email Brenda Campbell (opens in a new window)")

Profile

Brenda L. Campbell is a Dallas area native who has been a citizen of the City of Hutchins for more than 20+ years. She is married with children as well as grandchildren. She currently attends Turning Point Church of God in DeSoto. She has held leadership positions in church including youth teacher, drama ministry director, choir president and bus ministry. Councilwoman Brenda Campbell has a passion for not only being a leader but serving and helping others in her church and community. She is always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need and to make a positive impact while serving her community.

*Term Expires: May 2026*

[Print](https://www.cityofhutchinstx.gov/print/pdf/node/1161)
